data.name: Ghostrunner - Halloween Pack
data.detailed_description:
Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Climb Dharma Tower, humanity’s last shelter, after a world-ending cataclysm. Make your way up from the bottom to the top, confront the tyrannical Keymaster, and take your revenge.

Increase your cosmetic inventory even further with the Halloween Pack.

The following items included in this pack:
• The Jack-O Sword and Glove Set
• The Shroud Sword and Glove Set
• The Carnivore Sword and Glove Set
• The Night Terror Sword and Glove Set
• The Monstrosity Sword and Glove Set
• The Anomaly Sword and Glove Set"

data.short_description: Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Increase your cosmetic inventory even further with the Halloween Pack.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB) / Radeon RX 550 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (60FPS, Low settings, 720p)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 MB) or Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (60FPS, High settings, 1080p)

data.legal_notice: All product names, logos, brands, and registered trademarks are property of their respective owners. 505 Games and the 505 Games logo are registered trademarks of 505 Games SpA. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and gore in realistic graphics. Violence on human and human-like characters. Mutilated and dismembered bodies. Mature coarse language. The fear-inducing atmosphere, events, and characters.
